superHeroes.name: Batman
superHeroes.catchPhrase: I am the vengeance, I am the night, I am BATMAN!

superHeroes.name: Doctor Strange
superHeroes.catchPhrase: By the hoary hosts of Hoggoth!

superHeroes.name: Green Lantern
superHeroes.catchPhrase: In brightest day, in blackest night, no evil shall escape my sight. Let those who worship evil’s might, beware my power, GREEN LANTERN’S LIGHT!
